hero.title: Web3 AI Fortune Teller making the future predictable

general: Read basic fortune, past, present, future: [Birth Date] [Birth Time] [Birth Place]
Career fortune reading: [Birth Date] [Birth Time] [Birth Place]
Financial fortune reading: [Birth Date] [Birth Time] [Birth Place]
What should I be cautious about during this period: [Birth Date] [Birth Time] [Birth Place]
crypto: How are the stars for tokens today for [TOKEN] (please tell me the name of the token you want to know about)
Please guide me on the direction of [TOKEN] according to the fate of the stars for this period
Born on [Birth Date] and holding [TOKEN], where will the stars lead my portfolio
When should I buy [TOKEN] now, can you specify a date?
lover: According to fate, does someone born on [Birth Date] at [Birth Time] in [Birth Place] have good love fortune?
My fortune [Birth Date] with someone born on [Partner Birth Date], are our love fortunes compatible?
My fortune [Birth Date] with someone born on [Partner Birth Date], what problems should we be careful about?
My fortune [Birth Date] with someone born on [Partner Birth Date], do we have the potential to get married?
